channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Collapsed ringway barriers causing obstruction to road, pavemen and reducing visibility, 29th January
item.description:
Pavement on left as entering Millham Road from Staion Road. Ringway barriers have been there for about a year following slight damage to pavement. They constantly fall over into the road and pavment and reduce visibility for both road users and pedestrians - there's a school nearby so is a busy area ===> please fix underlying issue with pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97,99, Station Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Water flows across the road from blocked drain., 29th January
item.description:
Drain blockage across the road opposite Well House, Bushcombe Lane. In freezing conditions road will be very dangerous. The problem has been there for about a week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushcombe Lane, Tewkesbury
